issue.title: [RUST] [Datafusion] Test failure in aggregate_grouped_empty with simd feature enabled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10204](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10204). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

---- execution::context::tests::aggregate_grouped_empty stdout ----
thread 'execution::context::tests::aggregate_grouped_empty' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `["0,0.0"]`,
 right: `[]`', datafusion/src/execution/context.rs:883:9
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10204?focusedCommentId=17209797) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8378
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8378>
